name: Ghost Survivor (Banquoslayer, CookiePrototype, Lin8x)
description:
A low poly 3D survival game where you have to kill the monsters to complete each wave. Each progressive wave gets harder with more enemies so KEEP SHOOTING! You have max of 3 lives each wave. If you are unable to clear the wave and lose all 3 lives, you lose! 

Let's see how far you can go! good luck!

*Official Submission for the 2022 GameDev TV Game Jame*
